titleStmt.title: The grand charter of Christian feasts, with the right way of keeping them in a sermon preach'd at a meeting of several of the natives and inhabitants of the county of Buckingham, in the Church of St. Mary Le-Bow, Nov. 30, 1685 / by Lewis Atterbury ...
titleStmt.author: Atterbury, Lewis, d. 1693.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
